page.name: Public Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Public Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Public Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Public Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [BHS1/SBG7/GRA9][vRack] - ARP spoof restricted
incidents.message: Start Time : 07/01/2022 08:49 UTC End Time : 18/01/2022 11:00 UTC Service impact : vRack traffic on Stein PCI regions (BHS1,SBG7,GRA9) - no impact on other regions which are in Newton. Root cause : Configuration issue with port security groups implementation on vRack networks causing ARP spoofing to be restricted which was impacting when using an instance as a router such as pfSense.
